sentences.english: The single grain selection is better for the preharvest sprouting rate in the selective breeding application.
sentences.chinese: 在选择育种中，田间穗上发芽率以单粒选为好。

sentences.english: Jinhui12 is an excellent parental candidate in improving the characteristic of neck-panicle vascular bundles.
sentences.chinese: 缙恢12号是改良穗颈维管束性状的优良亲本。

sentences.english: The seed-heads should be hung up to dry.
sentences.chinese: 应该把那些种子穗挂起来晒干。

sentences.english: Narrow heritabilities of rows per ear and plant height are higer than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 穗行数和株高的狭义遗传力超过了50%。

sentences.english: The jowar stalks collapsed into the mud and the grain turned black.
sentences.chinese: 高粱杆子倒在泥地里，穗粒儿变黑了。

sentences.english: A pair of gold-plated, chain tasseled pierced earrings with pear-shaped Tanzanite Satin crystals.
sentences.chinese: 一对镀金，钻链耳环穗与梨状坦桑石缎晶体。

sentences.english: The typical characteristics of Hybrid Medium Rice Peiliangyou 3076 were big panicle, more grains and high yield potential.
sentences.chinese: 杂交中稻培两优3076穗大粒多，产量潜力大。

sentences.english: The spike photosynthesis is necessary to maintain the well-balanced metabolizability of glumes of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 穗光合也是维持颖壳正常生理代谢所必需的。

sentences.english: There was a good corresponding relationship between the main stem leafing and the spike differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 主茎出叶与穗分化有良好对应关系。

sentences.english: The coats of the admirals and generals were covered with gold braid.
sentences.chinese: 海陆军的将军们上衣上都饰有金色穗带。

sentences.english: But As concentration of brown rice has most positively correlation to that of culm.
sentences.chinese: 穗茎节砷含量与糙米砷含量之间呈极显著正相关。

sentences.english: Under-spike internodal can be regarded as a reliable morphological indicator for soil water co…
sentences.chinese: 穗下茎可作为土壤水分状况的良好指示性状。

sentences.english: Nitrogen deficiency reduced grain yield mainly through decreasing grain number per ear for both winter wheat and summer maize.
sentences.chinese: 不施氮主要通过降低两种作物的穗粒数影响产量。

sentences.english: More application of seeding-fertilizer is an effective method for increasing grain number per ear.
sentences.chinese: 重施种肥是春小麦提高穗粒数的有效措施。

sentences.english: More application of seeding-fertilizer is an effective method for increasing grain nu…
sentences.chinese: 重施种肥是春小麦提高穗粒数的有效措施。

sentences.english: Quickly strips kernels from ears of corn and helps protect fingers.
sentences.chinese: 能快速从玉米穗上刨出果仁还能保护手指。
